hero.name: DEVESH M
hero.heading: Hy! I’m DEVESH
hero.description: I'm a developer with a passion for creating clean and efficient web applications. I love turning ideas into real-time solutions using modern technologies. From frontend design to backend logic, I enjoy every part of the development process. Explore my work and let's build something great together!

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR Website and editing PROJECTS
about.description: I am currently available for freelance or contract UI/UX design projects. Whether you're launching a new product, revamping an existing interface, or just need help improving your user experience, I’d love to collaborate and bring your vision to life.

details.title: Modern Website Design for a Marketing Agency Startup
details.description:
Crafted a sleek and responsive website tailored for a fast-growing marketing agency. The design focuses on user engagement, clear call-to-actions, and seamless navigation to elevate client interaction and brand visibility.

The project incorporated dynamic elements and optimized performance, ensuring a smooth browsing experience across all devices.
details.langages: React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript , mangoodb database

details.title: Creative Video Editing for a Marketing Campaign
details.description:
Produced and edited high-impact video content tailored for a dynamic marketing agency. The project involved color correction, transitions, motion graphics, and sound design to create an engaging final product.

Designed to boost viewer retention and enhance brand messaging across social platforms, the result was a compelling video that captured attention and delivered results.

details.title: Custom Dashboard for Marketing Agency
details.description:
Designed and developed a modern, responsive dashboard interface tailored for a digital marketing agency startup. The project focused on clean UI/UX design principles to enhance user interaction and streamline daily operations.

Key features include intuitive navigation, custom data widgets, and seamless integration with existing platforms. The solution was optimized for performance and accessibility across multiple devices.

details.title: Mobile App Design for a Marketing Agency
details.description:
Crafted a sleek and intuitive mobile app design for a marketing agency to enhance their client engagement and performance tracking. The app features a user-friendly interface, consistent branding, and responsive layouts suitable for both iOS and Android platforms.

Design focused on usability, modern aesthetics, and optimized workflows to improve user retention and in-app navigation.

details.description: Startup Connect helps startups, investors, and mentors connect for collaboration, funding, and guidance to drive growth and success. allProjects.title: Accessible Design for the Visually Impaired
allProjects.subTitle: Inclusive Web & App Design

details.title: Inclusive Digital Platform for Visually Impaired Users
details.description:
Developed a fully accessible website and application interface tailored for visually impaired individuals. The design complies with WCAG 2.1 standards, ensuring screen reader compatibility, keyboard navigation, and high-contrast UI options.

Focus was placed on enhancing usability, minimizing visual clutter, and integrating voice feedback features to improve the overall user experience for those with vision challenges.
